title: Bug 13731Final request, response, session and other variables.
description: Provide a capability to declare request, response, session and other variablesin jspService function as final. As tunable feature, just like others, intomcat`s web.xml file.Why need this feature? To use request, response, session variables in anonymousimplementations of classes. For example  declaration of iterator throughelements, which includes some other JSP file (statically). And usage of thisiterator in other JSP file.
